title.rendered: September 2020, International Peace Day celebration and the International Peace Day Observance

content.rendered: September 2020, International Peace Day celebration and the International Peace Day Observance: “Shaping Peace Together”, the global ceasefire and the importance of coming together peacefully to fight COVID-19. United Nations
